description: Provides an expandable details-summary/body-header view. Uses bb-collapsible-ui for a predefined template ### Accessibility ariaLabelForIcon is discernible text for chevron icon

hasChevron.description: Whether chevron should be displayed. Defaults to true.

highlight.description: Whether card should be highlighted. Defaults to false.

shadow.description: Whether card should has shadow effect. Defaults to true.

isOpenChange.description: Emits when the isOpen input is changed.
